me.lucko.helper.command

Class CommandInterruptException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • me.lucko.helper.command.CommandInterruptException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class CommandInterruptException
extends Exception
    Exception thrown when the handling of a command should be interrupted.

    This exception is silently swallowed by the command processing handler.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • makeAssertion

        public static void makeAssertion(boolean condition,
                                 String failMsg)
                          throws CommandInterruptException
        Makes an assertion about a condition.

        When used inside a command, command processing will be gracefully halted if the condition is not true.

        Parameters:
        condition - the condition
        failMsg - the message to send to the player if the assertion fails
        Throws:
        CommandInterruptException - if the assertion fails

        public Consumer<CommandSender> getAction()
